Keywords: Cosmic , Frightful Four , Negative Zone , Ruler , Warrior
Real Name: Blastaar
Special Powers
TARGETING: This character can make range attacks while adjacent to opposing characters. (May target adjacent or non-adjacent opposing characters.)
THE FORCEFUL RULER OF BALUUR: Force Blast, Super Strength.
CONCUSSIVE BLAST FIGHT: Charge, Running Shot. FREE: Make a close attack.
THE LIVING BOMB BURST: Energy Explosion. When he uses it, the character(s) Blastaar originally targeted are dealt penetrating damage.
